title: Documentation of the current package (KiwiArray)
author: mdFazil

constructor.KiwiArray(): creates an array object and initialise the array size.

completed.get(): return the element from the array
completed.add(): add the element inside the array
completed.remove(): remove the specific value from the array
completed.removeAt(): remove the value from the particular index
completed.isEmpty(): return boolean value tell whether the array is empty or not
completed.length(): return the size of the array

pending: bulk operation - multiple value adding and removing and checking if the collection contains all the elements of another collection
add more if required and make it unique and industry best array collection under the brand kiwi
